data.comment: Today's referee, Felix Zwayer, has blown to start the match.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 6, Andre Hahn (Augsburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Wout Weghorst for Wolfsburg drives towards goal at Volkswagen Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 7, Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Wolfsburg needs to be cautious. Augsburg have an attacking throw-in.
In the minute 10, Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Wolfsburg.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 11, Augsburg are coming forward and Michael Gregoritsch gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Wolfsburg goal kick.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Wolfsburg.
In the minute 13, Augsburg to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Wolfsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Augsburg.
In the minute 16, Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Felix Zwayer signals a throw-in for Wolfsburg, close to Augsburg's area.
In the minute 18, Wolfsburg's Paulo Otavio misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Augsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Augsburg are pushing forward but Florian Niederlechner's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 21, Throw-in Wolfsburg.
Augsburg's Rani Khedira gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Wolfsburg have a goal kick.
In the minute 22, Can Augsburg capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Wolfsburg's half?
Felix Zwayer awards the home team a throw-in.
Felix Zwayer signals a Augsburg throw-in in Wolfsburg's half.
In the minute 23, Daniel Caligiuri of Augsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Felix Zwayer awards Wolfsburg a goal kick.
Wolfsburg drive upfield and Xaver Schlager gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Augsburg defender.
In the minute 25, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
In Wolfsburg, Wolfsburg push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
Felix Zwayer signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Augsburg's half.
In the minute 29, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
Florian Niederlechner (Augsburg) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 31, Augsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
Augsburg to take a throw-in in Wolfsburg territory.
Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
In the minute 33, Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
Wolfsburg are coming forward and Josuha Guilavogui gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 37, Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg's Maxence Lacroix attacks the ball with his head but his effort fails to hit the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
In the minute 38, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Augsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Wolfsburg awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 40, Throw-in for Augsburg in the half of Wolfsburg.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Augsburg have a goal kick.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Wolfsburg's Maximilian Arnold breaks free at Volkswagen Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
In the minute 45, Felix Zwayer awards Augsburg a goal kick.
Wolfsburg advance rapidly upfield but Felix Zwayer blows for offside.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 45, Throw-in for Augsburg in their own half.
The ref's whistle signals the end of the first-half.
The second-half is underway at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 46, Can Augsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Wolfsburg's half?
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Xaver Schlager (Wolfsburg) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 50, Felix Zwayer signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Augsburg's half.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 52, Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Wolfsburg in their own half.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg's Admir Mehmedi gets in a shot on goal at Volkswagen Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 54, Goal kick for Augsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Augsburg.
Ruben Vargas is replacing Andre Hahn for Augsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 57, Fredrik Jensen is replacing Michael Gregoritsch for the away team.
Heiko Herrlich is making the team's third substitution at Volkswagen Arena with Alfred Finnbogason replacing Florian Niederlechner.
Free kick for Augsburg in their own half.
In the minute 58, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Augsburg capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 62, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Augsburg.
Wolfsburg have a dangerous throw-in.
The home team replace Xaver Schlager with Yannick Gerhardt.
In the minute 64, Free kick for Wolfsburg in the half of Augsburg.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In Wolfsburg, Jerome Roussillon of Wolfsburg is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 67, Throw-in for Wolfsburg in the half of Augsburg.
In Wolfsburg Wolfsburg drive forward through Josip Brekalo. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Wolfsburg to take a throw-in in Augsburg territory.
In the minute 69, Wolfsburg push forward at Volkswagen Arena and Josip Brekalo gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Augsburg defence.
Throw-in for Augsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Can Wolfsburg get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Augsburg's half?
In the minute 70, Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Throw-in for Augsburg close to the penalty box.
Oliver Glasner (Wolfsburg) is making a second substitution, with Ridle Baku replacing Jerome Roussillon.
In the minute 72, The home team have replaced Admir Mehmedi with Daniel Ginczek. This is the third substitution made today by Oliver Glasner.
Heiko Herrlich (Augsburg) is making a fourth substitution, with Tobias Strobl replacing Rani Khedira.
Augsburg have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
In the minute 74, Important block from the Wolfsburg defence as Ruben Vargas fires in a strike for Augsburg.
Wout Weghorst of Wolfsburg is pulled up for offside.
Free kick for Wolfsburg in their own half.
In the minute 75, Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Augsburg in their own half.
Throw-in Wolfsburg.
In the minute 78, Felix Zwayer awards the home team a throw-in.
Yannick Gerhardt of Wolfsburg gets in a strike, but is off target.
Ball goes out of play for a Augsburg goal kick.
In the minute 80, Augsburg have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Wolfsburg is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Augsburg pushes forward through Alfred Finnbogason, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 84, Felix Zwayer signals a Wolfsburg throw-in in Augsburg's half.
Free kick Wolfsburg.
John Brooks (Wolfsburg) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 86, Throw-in high up the field for Wolfsburg in Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Goal kick for Augsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
In the minute 88, Felix Zwayer awards the away team a throw-in.
Augsburg awarded a throw-in in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 89, Wolfsburg needs to be cautious. Augsburg have an attacking throw-in.
Felix Zwayer signals a free kick to Augsburg.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg in their own half.
5 minutes will be added to the 2nd half.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Corner awarded to Wolfsburg.
Wolfsburg have been awarded a corner by Felix Zwayer.
Wout Weghorst (Wolfsburg) gets in a powerful header but the ball is cleared away.
In Wolfsburg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
John Brooks (Wolfsburg) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Wolfsburg.
Throw-in for Wolfsburg at Volkswagen Arena.
Felix Zwayer blows to end the match. The final score is 0-0.
Heiko Herrlich is making the team's fifth substitution at Volkswagen Arena with Reece Oxford replacing Carlos Gruezo.
Jeffrey Gouweleeuw (Augsburg) has received a yellow card from Felix Zwayer.
